name: Meeting Tom Cruise
description:
Nothing is more exciting than a celebrity sighting. Today you've decided to take a trip and drove to the airport. At this same airport is the one and only Tom Cruise - actor of such hits as TOP GUN and the MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE series. This game will decide if you meet Tom Cruise or suffer the fate of knowing you could have, but didn't.

Can you find all of the endings?

This game was created in 2016 using Twine. It does not promote or endorse Scientology, because Scientology is horrible.
